definitions.definition: the dead body of an animal.
examples: corpse, dead body, body, remains; Morecadaver; informalstiff, roadkill; archaiccorse "a mule carcass"Morecadaver; stiff, roadkill; corse a mule carcass

definitions.definition: the trunk of an animal such as a cow, sheep, or pig, for cutting up as meat.
examples: corpse, dead body, body, remains; Morecadaver; informalstiff, roadkill; archaiccorse "a mule carcass"Morecadaver; stiff, roadkill; corse a mule carcass

definitions.definition: the remains of a cooked bird after all the edible parts have been removed.
a person's body, living or dead.
examples: my obsession will last while there's life in this old carcass

definitions.definition: the structural framework of a building, ship, or piece of furniture.
the remains of something being discarded, dismembered, or worthless.
examples: the floor is littered with the carcasses of newspapers
